title: The new Riven skin with character inking doesn't outline the tassels properly
body:
If you face east and look at the wavy tassel things on her back the outline stops before the end of them.



It's like there is a box around her where things are outlined but it isn't big enough for the tassels so they get cut off from the outline

replies.body: This happens with all characters I believe. The character outline only stays within the hitbox. I have seen it on Varus' Heartseeker skin, the bow loses the black outline outside of the hitbox. Surprised they haven't fixed a bug that is like years old.

i have seen it before but this is really the worst i've seen it simply because you can see it at all times very clearly when she is facing east
I agree, it really bothers me that the skin came out of PBE with a lot of bugs. What is the point of putting her through 2 weeks of PBE if nobody reports the bugs they see?
HAH! Jokes on you, I broke my graphics card and play on potato mode!

Hey Octavia -

Unfortunately, this is a side effect of character inking, a system we don't have a ton of control over. In order to "resolve" this issue (it's more of a workaround), you'd need to turn off character inking in your video settings. 

To show you what it looks like with v. without:

http://imgur.com/m4Rd3YG

I don't believe so. This character inking issue that Dawnbringer Riven is having had is something that persisted prior to this patch, and something that already affected other skins, such as Order of the Lotus Karma. I actually don't have an idea as to what would have caused the issue you've linked, unfortunately. D:
